generate_content.description: Generate content from a prompt consisting of text and optionally images

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.example: Describe what you see in these images

filenames.name: Attachment filenames
filenames.description: Attachments to add to the prompt (images, PDFs, etc)

add_automation.name: Add Automation
add_automation.description: Creates a new Home Assistant automation from a YAML configuration provided by the AI or user.

automation_config.name: Automation YAML
automation_config.description: The YAML definition of the automation to add. This should include triggers, conditions, and actions.
automation_config.example:
alias: Turn on lights at sunset
trigger:
  - platform: sun
    event: sunset
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room

get_energy.name: Get Energy Stats
get_energy.description: Retrieves current energy usage statistics from the Energy dashboard.

deprecated_image_filename_parameter.title: Deprecated 'image_filename' parameter
deprecated_image_filename_parameter.description: The 'image_filename' parameter in Google Generative AI actions is deprecated. Please edit scripts and automations to use 'filenames' intead.
